Sanitation Solutions will NOT be picking up trash tomorrow (Tuesday, January 27th). They are planning a late start for Wednesday (commercial pick-up only) and will be on schedule for Friday for residential pick-up. They will try to fit both residential trash days (Tuesday and Friday) into one day. Please place all your bags for this week out for Friday. Thank you and be safe!

: The City of Gilmer adopted a tax rate that will raise more taxes for maintenance and operations than last year's tax rate. The tax rate will effectively be raised by 8% and will raise taxes for maintenance and operations on a $100,000 home by approximately $31.06.
